message.test: if( function-available('java:isEqualOrSuperset') ) then (every $m in ds:checklists/ds:component-ref satisfies ((every $n in xcf:get-component($m)//xccdf:platform[not(starts-with(@idref,'#'))] satisfies some $o in ds:dictionaries/ds:component-ref satisfies some $p in xcf:get-component($o)//cpe-dict:cpe-item satisfies java:isEqualOrSuperset($n/@idref,$p/@name)) and (every $q in xcf:get-component($m)//cpe-lang:fact-ref satisfies some $r in ds:dictionaries/ds:component-ref satisfies some $s in xcf:get-component($r)//cpe-dict:cpe-item satisfies java:isEqualOrSuperset($q/@name,$s/@name)))) else true()
